node.html: Develop and enhance the accuracy of ML models, ensuring more precise predictions that could significantly improve Airbnb's market positioning and customer satisfaction strategies.
Utilized the dataset containing 70,000 grayscale images and evaluated how accurately the network learned to classify images.
Explore the capabilities of MosaicML's MPT-7B model, a state-of-the-art language model, in generating diverse text completions for a variety of prompts.
Utilized a HuggingFace transformers model to generate summaries of 10 huge Daily Mail reviews with an average BERT 'F1' scores of 0.81.
Developed a CNN model for the MNIST handwritten dataset to classify images using TensorFlow with a validation accuracy of 98.85%.
Developed a BERT language model to predict the topic of user posts on Stack Exchange sites with an impressive test accuracy of 96.9%.
Designed and enhanced UMD MS Program Office's attendance database.
To quantify Cristiano Ronaldo's influence on his teams and identify patterns in his goal-scoring.
